And supper <S%G1173><s%> being ended, <S%G1096><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> having now <S%G2235><s%> put <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> of Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> Simon's <S%G4613><s%> son, to betray <S%G3860><s%> him;

Now <S%G1161><s%> there was leaning <S%G345><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> Jesus' <S%G2424><s%> bosom <S%G2859><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved. <S%G25><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> beckoned <S%G3506><s%> to him, that he should ask <S%G4441><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> it should be of whom <S%G3739><s%> he spoke. <S%G3004><s%>

And after <S%G3326><s%> the sop <S%G5596><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> him. Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to him, That you do, <S%G4160><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> quickly. <S%G5032><s%>

Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he was gone <S%G1831><s%> out, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> is the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> glorified, <S%G1392><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> is glorified <S%G1392><s%> in him.

Little <S%G5040><s%> children, <S%G5040><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> a little <S%G3397><s%> while I am <S%G1510><s%> with you. A new <S%G2537><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> to you, That you love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another; <S%G240><s%> as I have loved <S%G25><s%> you, that you also <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>
